column4: i need some help. i recently upgraded from 9.04 to 10.04 and i was updating all of my repositories to refelect the upgrade but now i get the following error:
E: The method driver /usr/lib/apt/methods/ppa could not be found.
anyone have an idea what this might be? haven't been able to find much after googling it
i don't know what that means and i would personally just do a fresh install
